name: Propagate (Sephta, sarahhartley)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Propagate is a traditional 2D platformer where the main method of traversal is to shape the environment in your favor. Platform your way through simple puzzle-like levels by using special seeds which propagate foliage to aid in level traversal.

CONTROLS

Move ~ WASD

Jump ~ SPACEBAR (can double jump)

Fire Seeds ~ LEFT mouse button (press and hold to aim)

Fire Water ~ RIGHT mouse button (hold to continuously fire)

Reset Level ~ the "R" key will reset the stage

THE TEAM:

  • Myself ~ Link
    • Programming, animation, 2D lighting, a tiny bit of level design
  • Sarah Hartley 
    • Art design, level design, SFX

MADE FOR THE MASHUP GAME JAM

This project was made in less than 72 hours for the MashUp Game jam hosted by MashUp Games. 

Theme: Unconventional Means
